case.state: ... G-greetings.
Hi... er, h-hello.
W-well, I... guess we'll see what happens.
So... what's gonna... I mean, what will happen?
Let... us have fun!
Just ~cards.text~, please.
Um... ~cards.text~, I re--- I mean, I guess.
Oh... uh... I would... like ~cards.text~... please.
Just better to go with ~cards.text~, I reckon.
Shucks, I dunno. ~Cards.text~? How's that?
For sure! Let's do ~cards.text~ this time!
Well, don't... isn't that nice?
I... I suppose I might just take it easy.
I... I'm not trying to show off. I don't think I even could...
If there's one thing I can do, it's hold my own.
Me? Lucky? I... I suppose I have my moments.
... Perhaps I got more than just a chance...
Well, don't that just beat all?
And here I was just thinkin' there ain't no way this works out just like I was hopin'!
I reckon you'll get a right kick outta this one.
Shucks! I'm happier than a hog on holiday!
Ol' Nephenee's got a trick or two up her sleeves! Least, what's left of 'em anyways.
I figure I maybe ain't winnin' this whole deal, but that don't mean I'm just gonna roll over, ya hear?
Soldiers are always... playing weird games in camp. Distractions keep... people calm.
... It pays to be careful, but not too careful...
... We will just have to show our hands and hope for the best.
... I do hope that wasn't a mistake. One too many mistakes and... well...
... Huh... well... I've survived worse odds.
... Not knowing what will happen next... pretty exciting.
No sense standing around gawpin'. Let's have us a look at the damage.
... Heck if I know how it's lookin'.
Nah, I ain't worried! If I lose then I lose 'n that's that, ain't it?
Shucks, this ain't so bad once you get into it. More fun than I thought, I'd say.
No point in gettin' all worked up with frettin' 'n fussin'. Not for me, it ain't.
What're we standin' around fer? Lay 'em don, why don't ya?
Well that... this is not ideal.
How do ya... I mean... it's nothing.
I have... I must have missed something.
Uh... h-hang on... where's the... oh, rats!
I might've... I may have messed that up....
Of all the... luck is not on my side this time...
There just ain't no way...
Consarn it!
Well that ain't exactly what I was picturin'. Not even a little bit.
Horsefeathers!
Now I've gone 'n stepped in it...
Reckon there's no chance of gettin' a do-over?
Do... people not fight where you're from?
Uh, pardon me, but I'm... not entirely comfortable being called "human." I prefer beorc. "Human" has some... unsavoriness to it...
I just... use a lance.
You mean tendin' to things at the farm? Not much else I've really tried my hand at aside from farmin' 'n fightin'.
Uh... m-my apologies. I'm trying to speak... properly. Sometimes it just slips out. It's mighty--- er, so very embarrassing...
I mean, I might if I need to...
... W-well...
... Um... serfs?
Boy howdy, ain't that the truth of it. S-still... ain't near so bad as... as I was thinkin'...
I-I ain't doin' it to turn heads 'r nothin'! I-If'n it ain't proper, I-I'll just go on 'n take it off!
Crimea was under attack. Daein... was leveling villages and burning crops. Taking up arms was the best chance we had at surviving.
When Daein invaded Crimea, there were--- there wasn't much of a choice. I'd never fought before--- a lot of us in the militia hadn't--- but we didn't want to just give up.
Uh, I-I ain't--- uh, am not looking fer a scrap... uh, ma'am! Honest truth!
S-sorry! O-or apologies! I just, this is what a wear 'n sometimes--- uh, I'll just... take it off!
Really? Well... that must mean you are an armorer, right?
... I'm guessing that... training doesn't count as "not fighting?"
Workshop? Barn is fer the livestock, Roll. Keep 'em and their fodder warm 'n dry 'n away from predators.
Ah, no, it ain't like that. Things're peaceful, but there's still folks who go around stirrin' up trouble. Sendin' a reminder that there's someone in the village who can fight helps keeps the peace.
Well, not for ol' Nephenee, at least. Most of the fellas in the village are scared of me on a account of... somethin' that happened 'n the lasses are more interested in the fellas...
W-wasn't really... plannin' on it. Th-that ain't weird... is it?
Feelin' a bit like I oughta just take my helmet off... I can feel everyone starin' at it more than my bits...
Is that so? I been all sorts of--- er, all different kinds of places, but I always end up... missing being back home in Ohma.
Well... the fighting was rough, but I always felt pretty confident on the battlefield. Protectin' everybody was important work.
N-no, I should apologize. You were bein' real nice 'n I was just makin' a fuss fer no good reason. R-real sorry 'bout that.
Reckon they do, but ain't no one's gran in Ohma would curse out someone who weren't kin. All the other elders were always sweet as honey to us.
Well, it ain't really all that special. Just keeps my noggin safe is all. Reckon I do feel a mite more comfortable when I have it on.
I-I mean, I figured I would. Th-that ain't a problem, right? H-how would you prefer to have me?
W-well... reckon you can see most of it with it on 'n everythin', but...
That's... kind of you to say. There were... plenty of people who did the same thing as me. We couldn't just sit by with everythin'... with everything that was happening.
O-oh, I'm just... making sure you all can understand me. The way I talk... usually ain't--- or, is not quite proper...
S-sorry, I'm just... a little out of practice. Been back home so long I'm not... used to speaking properly all the time.
I-I'm tryin'... sorta. I just don't want folks pokin' fun at me for the way I talk 'n such...
Ain't all that easy. Folks ain't always got the kindest things to say 'bout the way I talk...
... That is true. I am just a simple country soldier, after all...
Y-yes, I know. Simple--- a simple country girl is not much to look at...
I'm... not sure I catch yer meanin'? I mean... I work my family's farm and I protect the village when trouble comes too.
Well, you ain't wrong 'bout that. Ain't much good with a sword. Usin' a lance suits me just fine though. Had plenty o' practice with the lance.
Uh... o-oh? I-is that some sorta noble humor? Sorta sounds like yer puttin' me down, but yer face is sayin' you reckon I would be welcome in "Sharance."
Yeah, reckon I hear what yer sayin'. Ohma is big enough fer sure. Gotta wander out a ways to get privacy. Put a tree between y'self 'n e'ryone else...
R-reckon you mean yer bow, right? That sort of thing suits a beautiful high-class girl like you...
I... I had thought I would have to lose eventually. That's only fair.
Well, what can you do? Can't... I can't imagine I could go forever without losing anyway.
My turn? No point--- I mean, there is no point in avoiding it.
I'm no stranger to bad luck. There... there is no point in complaining about it.
Ah, well, no use cryin'.... no use complaining about it. I'll live.
Me again? I hope... you aren't expecting something flashy.
Hm, well, doin' better than I expected at least.
Ah, well, figures. Better just get comfortable.
Shame, that. I don't think it would hurt me to get a little more comfortable.
Never imagined I might be able to hold down a lead. Kinda makes a girl wanna try, ya know?
Huh... gettin' a little dicey for me...
Well, ain't this excitin'? I'm just about near down to my unmentionables.
Oh... shucks. Well... this ain't exactly gonna be proper.
I thought I was puttin' up a good fight. Not good enough, I reckon.
Well... I knew this would happen. Reckon I should just... roll with it.
I ain't usually in the habit of havin' my parts out in the breeze. Makes a girl a bit nervous, is all...
Huh... w-well, no point in raisin' a fuss. Might as well get to it...
Don't expect I'm gonna take it easy on you just because you got all my bits out.
That ain't even... y'all don't... I ain't whipped yet, ya hear?!
Uh... well... maybe I'll just take my helmet off for now instead of losin'. Just... I dunno... feels right all of a sudden...
... I could just give up now... but maybe it wouldn't be proper to get all randy with my helmet on...
Aww... to heck with it! I'll just take my helmet off and then I'll finish walloping y'all!
For cryin' out loud! I don't wanna lose yet! I can't lose yet!
... Fortune doesn't seem to be on my side to~background.time~.
Well, not my proudest moment. Reckon--- I mean, I know I'll have a few more.
So, this is where the fun begins, right?
Ah... that's unfortunate. Hard not to... I mean, it is hard not to worry a little.
Uh... so, this sort of thing... happens. I.... won't complain about it.
Right... well, never much been one for strategy personally.
No hidin' from the inevitable, I reckon.
Nothin' for it now. Just gotta keep my head up next time.
Eh, well, losin' ain't so bad when you've still got some wiggle room.
Rats. Things ain't going quite as smooth as I figured...
... What's the proper word for knickers again?
Too many more of these and I might keel over from embarrassment.
S-shucks... hope I got my head on right for this...
... Consarn it I gotta get my bits out now.
My luck ain't quite what I hoped it would be. Shoulda figured...
M-my heart is goin' plum crazy poundin' away in my chest. A-an' it ain't just from embarrassment neither...
Uh... shucks. I'm fixin' to be in the all together now, ain't I?
Right, right, it's my turn, but it ain't like I won't give just as good as I get.
Look here, I ain't some castle-bred lady who faints all over herself at immodesty. I'm not gonna get all worked up 'bout this, ya hear?
... It ain't to late to take my helmet off, right? I reckon I should use every chance I got...
Well, if'n my helmet is some kind of lucky charm, it ain't workin' right now. May as well just set it aside...
H-hey now wait one consarned minute! I ain't licked yet! Not by a country mile!
W-well maybe I ain't ready to call it quits yet! I reckon I still got fight in me with or without my helmet!
Maybe I a--- I mean, I am not going to make a great first impression like this.
... I will have to try not to make a habit out of doffing my clothes like this.
I... am not going to claim I'm very good at this sort of game. I'm not surprised I'd lose.
... I really should try not to fall too far behind in the beginning...
... Might be that I'm too simple for this sort of game...
... This does not bode well for the rest of this game, does it?
I-I ain't really that licked, am I? Oh... consarn it I think I am...
I ain't gonna lie... I was plannin' on leaving my helmet on... but...
There ain't no way I'm gonna go quietly, ya hear? Y'all ain't nothin' I can't handle!
Say, what's the big idea anyway? If'n y'all are lookin' for a fight, then you best get ready for a right walloping!
Just my luck, huh? Reckon there ain't no real way to fix that...
I ain't got any sort of plan. I'm just tryin' my best not to completely embarrass myself.
Kinda feels like my clothes are droppin' like flies over here...
Can't much pass for no high-born lady if I'm stuck standin' in my knickers right in front of y'all...
I'm going to places good decency ain't like to follow...
I always try to make do with what I'm given, but dagnabbit if all I could make was a fool of myself with what I got so far...
Oh! Consarn it! I got all distracted by--- uh, n-never you mind!
Maybe all this excitement is gettin' the better of me...
Figures my luck ain't improved none. Reckon y'all are gonna get a good look at the way the goddess made me...
This all took a right turn downhill, didn't it? I ain't used to bein' on display like this...
I ain't much of a card playin' girl anyways... not much of a standin' 'round with her clothes off girl either, I reckon...
I-I wouldn't mind losin' if there weren't so much losin' involved? Y'know what I mean? Aw, shucks, I oughta just show you.
Dagnabbit, I--- w-wait, what am I getting all bent outta shape for? I ain't licked yet!
... And that's what you are? A... reploid?
Y-yeah, I... figure I am, but it's just that some beorc use "human" in order to imply some other folks--- uh, people aren't "human."
N-not sure I much like being called primitive...
It's honest work. My family's been workin' the land since afore any of us can remember.
W-well... ain't nobody made fun of me afore because of my body...
I-I-It ain't just just the top of my head. I-It sorta blocks my face a bit too...
Okay! Okay! You don't hafta pitch a fit...
I-I hear y'all--- uh, you two, but us small folk love Queen Elincia. She's always treated us... well and looked after us and... I mean, never called us "serfs" for one thing...
Yeah, especially if'n it--- I mean, especially since it meant no more marching and no more fightin'--- fighting.
Well, when I'm not trainin', I'm... helping out on the farm or goin'--- uh, going fishing.
W-well, you gotta be careful walkin' 'round the fields. You oughta walk up on the furrows so you don't go 'n pack down the soil. If'n yer not careful, all your tilling won't be no good.
Of course! It's my home I'm protectin', after all. I ain't some strange sellsword tryin' to milk gold outta scared farmers. I'm a farmer like them too, but a farmer with a mean lance arm.
Reckon I do. Didn't know I did, but I had an experience with a woman I fought alongside durin' the war...
Honest...?
So... you are just handy with a hammer? I don't meet a lot of... girls who are smithies.
W-well... just... I'm just... you know... trying to be... normal.
I can only promise I'll try. I-It's a little hard to just stop worrin' about the way I talk all sudden-like...
We celebrate the new year as well. Drinkin' barleywine, dancin', carryin' on 'n such. Meemaw don't curse near as much with a belly full of good drink!
Plannin' on it. I ain't even sure I wanna take it off at all, to be honest...
Th-thank ya kindly. B-besides... ain't like I'm not feelin' up for showin' off this part of me...
... Yer enthusiasm is blinding...
I ain't quite sure y're right about that...
Y-y're tryin' to get a girl riled up on purpose now, aintcha?
Once the war was over, most folks... most people decided not to fight anymore. There's still trouble out there though. Still more 'n enough reason to fight...
Most folks ain't--- I mean, most people aren't cut out for fighting. Even the most hardened soldiers put their weapons away after the war. But for me... still reckon there'll be reason to fight.
W-wait... what? I'm-I'm-I'm--- huh?
H-huh? M-me? Th-th-th-that ain't... I ain't...
W-well hang on, I fought 'n bled just as much as any knight did. Ain't--- uh, isn't that worth anything to you?
... You don't need to worry. The helmet is... saying on for sure.
M-maybe it is a little unusual. Reckon both 're important to get done. Wouldn't be no good if'n I didn't tend to 'em both.
I ain't so sure. Swords 're short little things 'n lances 're nice 'n long. Ain't about to let some cocksure ruffian with a blade get in close enough fer a swipe at me.
Ah well, shucks, Sofia. Ain't no cause to worry none about me stealin' away yer men...
Reckon I'm talkin' about givin' in to 'em. If'n a girl ain't got nobody and no room fer herself, she's just gotta get out there 'n tend to herself...
W-well... reckon its high time I got rid of it then...
... Uh, I beg your patience for a moment. I'll have this off in... just a moment.
... Sorry... I mean, my apologies. This does take a bit of... effort to get off.
... J-just hang on. Armor... is not supposed to come off easy, you see?
Been fighting--- or, I have been fighting so long, it was just about time to take a bit of a breather.
Sorry to come in here all dressed for a fight. I'm really just tryin' to--- I mean, I am trying to take it easy.
I was hopin'--- or, hoping to just take it easy. Tho--- I thought this sounded like it might be fun.
Don't march in bad boots if you can help it. Heck, don't march at all if'n you can help it.
A good soldier takes care of her boots, You learn that right quick when you're out fightin' all the time. Sure footin' is liable to save your life more than once.
Back in the militia, I was kickin' around in some right sorry boots. I thank Queen Elincia each day for outfittin' us with proper equipment.
Ah, I'm sorry if I'm comin' off a little stiff. I have trouble with strangers sometimes. Not sure how to come off, ya know?
I'm kinda sorta feelin' a bit more at ease. Sorry if I was talkin' funny or somethin'. Just tryin' not to come off as too much of a bumpkin...
I sure hope you don't mind too much the way I talk. I always try to talk all proper like when there's strangers around.
There's somethin' to havin' a moment to get this dress off. Usually in the heat of things, a girl can only get her knickers down...
Well, it sure is somethin' to be droppin' this 'round my ankles in the heat of things rather than have it pulled over my head...
The dress don't usually come off when passion strikes. Been fondled over and through it more than once or twice...
Can't run my mouth and say nothin' embarrassing if I just keep it shut...
I'm already showin' my bits off. Probably shouldn't ramble on and embarrass myself further...
... This is plum embarrassin' enough without me opening my mouth 'n sayin' something dumb.
Shucks, I got friends what seen my bare bottom who ain't seen the top of my head...
J-just look here, alright? Don't go blabbin' you saw me without my helmet, alright? Folks won't believe you anyway...
It ain't like I got my helmet on all the time. I take it off 'n brush my hair afore bed... 'n only sometimes I put it back on when I sleep...
L-lands... r-reckon that's fair since.... since I been starin' at you all this time...

state.text: G-gettin' a bit warm 'round here a-all of a sudden...

case.state: R-right consider it forgotten o-or unheard!

state.text: N-now you got my heart jumpin' all over the place all for nothin'!

case.state: I really ain't--- I mean, I wouldn't be so sure about that...
H-huh? N-no, it's actually Nephenee... but I guess that's close enough...
I don't much care to be called none of those things!
Speck a dirt never hurt nobody. There's mud too sometimes if'n that's more yer interest! Cold wet mud!
W-well shucks... reckon I don't know what to say to that...

state.text: H-hey! I ain't some cake-eatin' castle-bred noble lady! Th-there's gonna be some hair on my n-nethers!

case.state: ... I ain't ashamed of that none. Ladies got hair on their nethers. Just natural...
I-I liked it better when you were just peerin' at my bits...

state.text: W-wait one darn minute! Why am I lettin' you boss me around?
I was just gettin' to sayin' that, but you started a hollerin' at me!

case.state: See? Now who's got no sense...
I-It's possibly I might be... biased. After all, I fought and bled right beside the Queen back when she was just the Princess...
Ain't nothin' wrong with that--- ah, that is to say, everybody should be so lucky, Miss Nadeshiko.
W-w-well, y-yeah, there's no gettin'--- er, getting around that. Even if'n I really try...
S-sorry, but... just seems to me an awful waste to have all that land 'n not be usin' it fer nothin'...
I ain't completely alone, but must folks don't want no part in fightin' no more. Old folks like Brom, who went through all the same fightin' I did, ain't picked up a weapon since.
... Shucks, suffice to say I've got a hankerin' to do it again...
W-well... I was comfortable, but now I'm feelin' a bit weird about it myself...

state.text: C-can't a girl just cover her head without everyone makin' a fuss over it?

case.state: No foolin'? Shucks, I know more than a few lasses who're a real terror on the battlefield!
Th-that's easy to say if'n y're not inclined to run your gob 'n look like some idiot hick!
Grandma bit? ...Oh! Seems yer gran don't swear near as much as meemaw does...
Pa said once that if'n the war'd happened when meemaw was a youngin', she'd have routed the lot of 'em afore they had time to consider retreatin'.
Sure do appreciate that, Nadeshiko. Maybe I will take it off if'n I have to. Might as well go all in...
Sh-shucks... seems like I keep hearin' that... f-from girls better lookin' than me...

state.text: Careful now. Words like that're liable to light a fire in a girl...

case.state: I-I'm not sure. Heart's a-poundin' so hard I can't do much thinkin'...

state.text: I think I could use a bit more pink right about now...

case.state: ... There just... isn't getting through to some of you noble-types...
... You don't look to happy about gettin' yer way...
H-huh? I ain't... oh, wait. You mean I'm actually... I-I get it! Yer bein' ironic, right?
Reckon if you think that way y'all must have quite the sword arm there...
W-well, don't worry none! Fellas wouldn't care none for a bumpkin like me when there's a sophisticated lady like you r-right there!
Now, I wouldn't say bein' all alone is my preference...

state.text: Funny y'all should ask. Reckon if I'm gonna lose I oughta bring one of you down with me.

case.state: I ain't so sure I could handle whatever it is yer fixin' to say...

state.text: We've got this fair, didn't we? I think the time fer just talkin' is long gone...

case.state: Alright, no more armor. No need for that sort of protection while we are here, right?
It's more... I'm more comfortable like this. I am grateful to be able to lose this one time.
I don't really need all my armor while I'm here anyway. No sense in... there is no reason to walk around in all that heavy metal.
Do... are the rest of you used to this sort of game? This is a... bit unusual for me...
... It wouldn't be a problem if I left before getting... you know? I-I re--- think I'll be fine, but it is just nice to know...
G-gettin' a little nervous with barely a few things off. I do hope I can relax some...
Well... I guess this ain't so bad. I am havin' fun in a sort of way...
I'm feelin' kinda sorta... excited, you know? I know it ain't proper, but...
Kinda liberatin' not having to be fully dressed. Not sure I'll feel that way when my knickers are comin' off, but it ain't so bad for now.
... Really thinkin' this don't end any way that don't involve me havin' my tits out...
... Reckon I ought to get myself ready to have my tits out. Feels pretty certain to me.
Naw, I ain't gonna run out yet. If you were fixin' to see my tits, your chances are lookin' good...
T-they ain't much, but showin' them a bit of lovin' goes a long way for me...
Y-yeah... so... 'neath all that armor I'm just as soft 'n warm as any girl...
... I'll be honest... I've been thinkin' 'bout showing these off since I got my armor off. Weren't proper to admit 'til now...
... Y-yeah, well, words ain't comin' to me anyways...
... J-just stare if you're gonna stare. I ain't bothered... or nothin'...
... I-I'm not gettin' all worked up... I'm... already... {small}worked up{!reset}...
W-well... that was the last thing keepin' my head from floatin' away...
... I ain't never felt so naked in my life.
C-can we move along? I feel like y'all are starin' at my helmet hair....
... That's too bad, ~target~. A bet is a bet, though.
... Your turn, ~target~. Be brave.
Well, this... promises to be a treat for the rest of us.
I don't know a lot of... men who are shy about taking their clothes off.
Got... we've got ~target~ on the defensive now.
... That could have been any of us. Apologies, ~target~.
I... imagine it won't be as bad as you think it will be. Better to just get it... over with.
I can't help but think it's... going to end up being me each time.
Ain't no need to be shy, handsome. Show us what you're made of.
You looked so happy when it was my turn, so how about a smile while you strip y'self?
Ain't you know if you bother the hens you'll end up pecked?
I'm startin' to think more fellas oughta make a show of takin' their clothes off...
You ain't tougher or luckier than me, ~target~, so don't s'pose you'll get outta here with your knickers on.
Let's go ahead 'n get somethin' else outta the way!
Don't look at me, ~target~. I ain't bailin' you outta this one!
Reckon you oughta try and make a case fer y'self.
Sorry--- er, apologies, ~target~. I do not mean any disrespect.
Well... that worked out better than I hoped...
... Never--- uh, I never know what to say in these moments.
Lucky--- it is fortunate we get to see a bit more of ~target~.
Hey, ~target~, uh... do your best?
Might be strange to say, but I hope this helps us get to know each other a little better...
... I was hoping it would work out just like that...
A pretty girl like you ain't--- I mean, does not have anything to be ashamed of.
Mighty glad to get more of a look at you, ~target~.
Yer too pretty to let get away too soon, ~target~.
Well, ain't that a dinger of an outcome! No hard feelings, right, ~target~?
Ain't a thing wrong gettin' to know ~target~ better...
Ain't no wriggling your way out of it. Hope it don't get you too flustered.
Chin up, ~target~! If'n I can do it, I reckon you can!
I know losin' ain't all that fun, but ya sure make the rest of us feel lucky when ya do!
Sometimes hopin' and prayin' really does get you what you want...
... Men don't usually hesitate so much.
... I guess we are not in any kind of hurry.
... Must be part of some kind of strategy.
... You couldn't do more than that?
S'pose it wouldn't be proper to bellyache over every little thing.
If'n you came all prepared to take your time, then I s'pose that's what you did.
Dunno why yer tryin' to cool things off.
Fellas really will play the game without even thinkin' about what it's really for.
... I guess we will just have to wallop--- uh, best you again.
It is a fine thing to keep us motivated to see you lose again.
... Nowhere to go but up from here.
I reckon--- I guess they do say to leave people wanting more.
Let's not just keep yappin' about it. Let's just carry on down the road.
Fellas really oughta learn to put some effort into bein' sexy...
Honestly, yer sorta bummin' me out, ~target~.
Hope yer fixin' to take this seriously eventually...
... I was sorta--- uh, sort of hoping for more.
Yeah, seems like girls like taking it slower compared to fellas--- uh, men.
... It is unfortunate for the rest of us that you came prepared.
Guess... you are not ready to get completely serious yet.
This ain't yer way of teasin' us, is it?
Ah, shucks. Shoulda figured you'd go for ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~...
Right, girls prefer to take it slow, I reckon.
Oh, figures there's somethin' to get outta the way...
... There is still a lot to look forward to. We can be thankful for that.
Reckon--- I mean, I guess there's no need to rush you along.
That's fair. I'm just gonna keep... winning.
If you're not going anywhere yet, then there's still a chance for something more exciting.
Look, I ain't used to takin' the lead here, ~target~. Maybe I ain't a very good leader.
Time's runnin' out to get to the good part...
I'd be right glad if you found the courage to go a bit further, if'n you think you can.
S'pose you're more of a lady than me.
Yeah, let's go ahead and get ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ out of the way.
